title: How do you report a player threatening DDoS?
body:
Been playing ARAM and had people threatening DDoS attack. I reported several times before but still seeing the guy on. I got screenshot but current in client player report doesn't allow for attachment. 

Before people say "it's just aram" or "it's just some kid bluffing." I can handle trash talk, people afk, or rage feeding but threatening to hack and cyber attack people seems like a whole different level of bad behavior that should not be tolerated in any of the game modes.

replies.body: I don't believe we actively take any reports of threats of DDoSing. You're welcome to block that person so they can't continue sending you those types of messages. If it concerns/bothers you enough, feel free to shoot us a screenshot of the conversation in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
just go to the riot support website and submit a ticket for player behavior and attach the screenshots to the ticket
